Name: World Zero
About the game: Play as Shouta Kitano, travelling through the lands of a dying world in a parallel universe and save the world by bringing the core to the underground facility made by his dad. Through his journey, he will make friends that join his quest to get to the facility. He won't just meet new friends, he will also meet a strange man who tries to stop him from delivering the core by sending some hired mercenaries.
Meta Title: World Zero: Oct 12, 2022, Ashton Chiu and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on World Zero? Check out the release date (Oct 12, 2022), developer insights from Ashton Chiu, and a complete game summary.
